Class NeighborCFExt

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AlgAbstract
      • net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderAbstract
        • net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedRecommenderAbstract
          • net.hudup.core.alg.cf.MemoryBasedCFAbstract
            • net.hudup.core.alg.cf.NeighborCF
              • net.hudup.alg.cf.NeighborCFExt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, net.hudup.core.alg.Alg, net.hudup.core.alg.AlgRemote, net.hudup.core.alg.AlgRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.cf.MemoryBasedCF, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedAlg, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedAlgRemote, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedAlgRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedRecommender, net.hudup.core.alg.Recommender, net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderRemote, net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.SetupAlgListener, net.hudup.core.alg.SupportCacheAlg, net.hudup.core.data.Exportable, net.hudup.core.logistic.Inspectable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NeighborCFExtItemBased, NeighborCFExtUserBased, NeighborCFTwosCombined, WaspWaistCF

    public abstract class NeighborCFExt
extends net.hudup.core.alg.cf.NeighborCF
    This class sets up an advanced version of neighbor collaborative filtering (Neighbor CF) algorithm with more similarity measures.
    There are many authors who contributed measure to this class.
    Authors Haifeng Liu, Zheng Hu, Ahmad Mian, Hui Tian, Xuzhen Zhu contributed PSS measures and NHSM measure.
    Authors Bidyut Kr. Patra, Raimo Launonen, Ville Ollikainen, Sukumar Nandi contributed BC and BCF measures.
    Author Hyung Jun Ahn contributed PIP measure.
    Authors Keunho Choi and Yongmoo Suh contributed PC measure.
    Authors Suryakant and Tripti Mahara contributed MMD measure and CjacMD measure.
    Authors Junmei Feng, Xiaoyi Fengs, Ning Zhang, and Jinye Peng contributed Feng model.
    Authors Yi Mua, Nianhao Xiao, Ruichun Tang, Liang Luo, and Xiaohan Yin contributed Mu measure.
    Authors Yung-Shen Lin, Jung-Yi Jiang, Shie-Jue Lee contributed SMTP measure.
    Author Ali Amer contributed Amer and Amer2 measures.
    Author Loc Nguyen contributed TA (triangle area) measure.
    Authors Ali Amer and Loc Nguyen contributed quasi-TfIdf measure. Quasi-TfIdf measure is an extension of Amer2 measure and the ideology of TF and IDF.
    Author Ali Amer contributed numerical nearby similarity measure (MMNS).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Checking whether the similarity measure requires to declare discrete bins in configuration (VALUE_BINS_FIELD).
        Returns:
        true if the similarity measure requires to declare discrete bins in configuration (VALUE_BINS_FIELD). Otherwise, return false.

      • requireDiscreteRatingBins

        Parameters:
        measure - specified measure.
        Returns:
        true if the similarity measure requires to declare discrete bins in configuration (VALUE_BINS_FIELD). Otherwise, return false.

      • quasiTfIdf

        protected double quasiTfIdf(net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating1,
                            net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating2,
                            net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile1,
                            net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile2)
        Calculating the quasi-TfIdf measure between two pairs. Quasi-TfIdf measure is developed by Ali Amer and Loc Nguyen. Quasi-TfIdf measure is an extension of Amer2 measure and the ideology of TF and IDF. Quasi-TfIdf measure is only applied into positive ratings. The first pair includes the first rating vector and the first profile. The second pair includes the second rating vector and the second profile.
        Parameters:
        vRating1 - first rating vector.
        vRating2 - second rating vector.
        profile1 - first profile.
        profile2 - second profile.
        Returns:
        Quasi-TfIdf measure between both two rating vectors.
